title: (PR) AMD Instinct MI355X Drives Competitive Performance, Ideal for Optimized LLM Workloads
description: AI training workloads are pushing the limits of modern GPU architectures. With the release of AMD ROCm 7.0 software, AMD is raising the bar for high-performance training by delivering optimized support for LLM workloads across the JAX and PyTorch frameworks. …
